backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, vehicles, notifications, invite tokens, activation tokens, and permission checks with admin and user authorization helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source file paths to short functional descriptions for documentation or tooling.
frontend/.eslintrc.cjs: ESLint configuration enabling TypeScript, React, and React Hooks rules with custom warnings and ignored patterns.
frontend/.prettierrc.json: Prettier formatting configuration defining code style rules such as semicolons, print width, and quote style.
frontend/CHANGE_CONTROL_POLICY.md: Change-control policy outlining protected interfaces, required review steps, and mandatory checklists for code modifications.
frontend/CHANGELOG.md: Project changelog detailing added features, changes, and protected interfaces for versions 1.0.0 and 0.1.0.
frontend/ci-run-gates.sh: Shell script running all frontend quality gates in CI using npm run gates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color variables, theming, and base UI styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint configuring metadata, PWA manifest, icons, and loading the main React application.
frontend/PR_CHECKLIST.md: Pull request checklist enforcing change-control, quality gates, testing, and documentation requirements.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Defines PWA metadata, theme colors, icons, and app categories for Pasar Digital Community.
frontend/public/sw.js: Implements service worker with cache strategies for static assets, exclusions for PWA icons, and cache version management.
frontend/QUALITY_GATES.md: Documentation describing automated quality gates and instructions for running them.
frontend/README_CHANGE_CONTROL.md: Guide explaining how to use the change-control system during development.
frontend/README_VERSIONING.md: Versioning guide describing semantic versioning usage and version update rules.
frontend/src/__tests__/router-smoke.test: Empty test file placeholder for router smoke tests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Router routes and wraps the app with query client, identity provider, and error boundary.
frontend/src/components/activation/Vehic: UI card allowing users to view activation status and redeem vehicle registration activation tokens.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with navigation back to the dashboard and admin info alert.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Error screen shown when profile loading fails, with backend health diagnostics and copyable error details.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Sign‑in screen prompting users to authenticate with Internet Identity and explaining system benefits.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupBoot: Startup error screen with retry logic, backend health status, and detailed error copying functionality.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Displays the app logo with configurable size and optional styling.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Empty placeholder file for a language switcher component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps pages with optional header and footer based on authentication and routing.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Dialog for reporting a vehicle as lost, stolen, or pawned with category and note input.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog allowing users to submit a found report for a previously lost vehicle.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Responsive header with navigation, user menu, and admin visibility logic.
frontend/src/components/system/TopLevelE: Error boundary that catches unexpected app errors and shows a fallback UI.
Fallback screen explaining critical errors and offering a reload action.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Initiates a vehicle transfer requiring PIN verification and generates a shareable transfer code.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: PIN entry dialog with validation used to authorize sensitive actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrapStat: Tracks actor bootstrap status with auto and continuous retry logic for stopped-canister errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin-related queries and mutations, including admin checks, invite codes, activation tokens, and system stats.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Checks backend reachability and diagnostics using an anonymous actor with periodic refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Fetches lost vehicles and provides mutations to mark vehicles lost or found with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Retrieves user notifications and allows marking them as read with periodic polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Handles onboarding mutation with detailed logging, error normalization, and related cache invalidations.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Manages PIN existence checks and provides setup and update PIN mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Fetches and saves the caller’s user profile with identity-aware query keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Provides mutations to initiate and accept vehicle transfers and updates related caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleCheck.ts: Runs a vehicle status check by engine number via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleRegistratio: Provides React Query hooks to check vehicle registration activation and redeem activation tokens, with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Defines hooks for fetching user vehicles, fetching a single vehicle, and registering a vehicle using the actor API with cache updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstrap file initializing React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider, then rendering the App.
frontend/src/pages/__tests__/VehiclesPag: Empty test file placeholder for VehiclesPage fetch-flow tests.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with app description, features, and admin contact info.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Provides a form to accept vehicle ownership transfer via code with validation, mutation handling, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing system statistics with loading, error handling, and access control checks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Admin page to generate and manage vehicle registration activation tokens with validation and clipboard helpers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user dashboard with vehicle stats, notifications, reported vehicles, and quick action cards.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Shows a searchable list of lost, stolen, or pawned vehicles with status badges and report details.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays user notifications, supports marking items as read, and handles loading and empty states.
Empty file placeholder for onboarding via invite.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Provides onboarding form to create a user profile and optionally claim first‑admin status, then navigates based on result.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and edits user profile data, manages logout, and includes PIN creation and update flows.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Form to register a vehicle with photo upload and activation checks, submitting data to backend.
Allows users to create or update a PIN for secure vehicle ownership transfer.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleCheckPage.tsx: Provides engine-number search to check vehicle status and displays detailed results with status badges.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed info for a single vehicle, including status badges, reports, and owner-only actions like transfers or marking lost.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Lists the user's vehicles with status indicators and provides registration or activation actions based on account state.
frontend/src/routes/__tests__/RootRouteG: Empty test file placeholder for RootRouteGate tests.
frontend/src/routes/RootRouteGate.tsx: Governs app bootstrapping, authentication, profile loading, and retry flows before rendering the main layout.
frontend/src/utils/__tests__/bootstrapEr: Empty test file placeholder for bootstrap error utilities.
frontend/src/utils/actorProxy.ts: Creates a proxy around backend actors to safely handle admin initialization tokens and avoid startup failures.
frontend/src/utils/actorQueryKey.ts: Provides a consistent React Query key generator for actor-related queries.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Implements a client-side allowlist for admin principals with helpers to check and retrieve entries.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapError.ts: Provides functions to classify bootstrap errors, detect stopped canister conditions, and generate user guidance with extracted technical details.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeActorError.t: Normalizes actor-call errors into user-safe messages with categorized error types and preserved raw error data.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingTroubleshoo: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/version.ts: Defines the application's version and build timestamp constants.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata detailing state, features, and new feature requests related to restoring PIN management without impacting existing users.
